name: escape (itch) (see brews  games)
description:
can you make it out and escape ?

you will need to think you way out of this puzzle .

(you may learn a bit of binary along the way)

computer  controllers :  

up (arrow up, w) 

down (arrow down, s)

left (arrow left, a)

right(arrow  right , d)

A (alt, z, j)

B (control, k, x) 

start (Enter)

select (shift)
